bio.name: Ján Miškovič
bio.text.line1: Bachelor of Applied Informatics, currently freelancing in web development / design.
bio.text.line2: Started with WordPress in 2020, then moved onto Next.js, React and Tailwind.
bio.text.line3: Fan of functional programming and creative coding. Always looking to learn new things.
bio.text.line4: I love movies, video games, and challenges - currently learning Japanese (*^▽^*)
